entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Leader

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
